content: ðŸ“‚Â Reference â†’ Airnode â†’ v1.0 â†’ Deployment Files â†’ Templates  aws.env [#] (#frontmatter-title)  ===  The aws.env contains AWS credentials from an IAM user. These credentials are used by the Docker [deployer image] (./../../grp-providers/docker/deployer-image.html) to deploy an Airnode to AWS. For more details, see the full description of the [aws.env] (./../deployment-files/aws-env.html) file. ---Variable names cannot contain dashes (-) or start with a number. shAWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=<FILL_*> AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=<FILL_*>  1 2 [Previous pagesecrets.env] (/reference/airnode/latest/deployment-files/templates/secrets-env.html)  [Next pagegcp.json] (/reference/airnode/latest/deployment-files/templates/gcp-json.html)
